title: Anna's Dress
description: He stole my heart long before my sister stole his. She was the "bad girl" all the guys wanted and I was the "good girl" everyone overlooked. Now my sister is dead. I'm alone, left in the shadow she cast over me. He's the last person I expect to see at the funeral. And now I need him more than ever. *The question is this... who are you? #iamadena or #iamanna
author: London Casey
